#### Table

```{r , results='asis', echo = FALSE, out.width = "70%"}

  reactable(dataset.SE@metadata[["DiffExpAnal"]][["DEF"]][[contrast]],
            defaultPageSize = 6, searchable = TRUE, paginationType = "simple",
            columns = list(
              logFC = colDef(
                  style = function(value) {
                      color <- if (value >= 0) {
                        "#008000"
                      } else if (value < 0) {
                        "#e00000"
                      }
                      list(fontWeight = 600, color = color)
                  }
                )
              )
            )
```
